description: JSON schema for a search document.

type.description: Type of the search document. These must be lower case per the search spec.
type.name: DocumentTypeNames

id.description: The id of the search document.  Currently we are using the Synapse entity id for this.

version.description: The zero-based version number of the search document.  Currently we are using the Synapse entity etag for this.

lang.description: The language of the free text search found in the document.
